Body:
"""Test set_host_io_limit_iops_or_mbps."""
storage_group = self.data.qos_storagegroup
iops = '3000'
dynamic_distribution = 'Always'
mbps = '9001'
ref_qos_specs = {'maxIOPS': iops, 'DistributionType': dynamic_distribution,
    'maxMBPS': mbps}
with mock.patch.object(self.provisioning, 'update_storagegroup_qos'
    ) as mock_qos:
    self.provisioning.set_host_io_limit_iops_or_mbps(storage_group, iops,
        dynamic_distribution, mbps)
    mock_qos.assert_called_once_with(storage_group, ref_qos_specs)
